attributes.action: All members of Parliament should publish their entire internet browsing history.
attributes.background:
We are meant to live in the free world, but we are continuously being stripped of our freedoms and personal sovereignty.
The measure stated might ensure a different voting pattern in parliament in regards to the 'Snoopers Charter' bill - nothing to hide, nothing to fear? Yeah right.

rejection.details: The browsing histories of individual MPs are not the responsibility of Parliament as a whole.
